knimeNode.name: Structures List
knimeNode.shortDescription: Knime node to retrieve a list of structures for a given set of kinase IDs from KLIFS

fullDescription.intro: Knime node to retrieve a list of structures for a given set of kinase IDs from KLIFS
fullDescription.option: Column from the input stream with the kinase IDs

ports.inPort: Input with at least a column with kinase IDs
ports.outPort: All structural information obtained from KLIFS
